title: Generate local coverage badges
description: Compute coverage in CI, generate local coverage badges (Python/Rust) without external services, and update README to use those badges.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Added tools/coverage_badge.py and updated CI to compute coverage percent/colors and publish local coverage badges; README now uses local badge SVGs. Coverage XML not present locally unless pytest --cov is run.
